benchmark_details.name: Polish-ASTE: Aspect-Sentiment Triplet Extraction Datasets for Polish
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces two new datasets for Aspect-Sentiment Triplet Extraction (ASTE) that contain customer opinions about hotels and purchased products expressed in Polish.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide datasets for the challenging task of Aspect-Sentiment Triplet Extraction (ASTE) in the Polish language.

data.source: Customer reviews taken from the Wroclaw Corpus of Consumer Reviews Sentiment (WCCRS), specifically from the domains of hotels and products.
data.size: 1,197 examples for hotels, 851 examples for products
data.annotation: Annotated by Polish native speakers using the Doccano annotation platform.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated using exact match criteria for triplet accuracy.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better performance by models in extracting aspect-sentiment triplets.
methodology.baseline_results: TrelBERT achieved the highest F1-score values for the Polish datasets.
